PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: -5.5 eV , which were much lower than the reported benzodithiophene-NT ( PBDT - DTNT ) based poly- mers , 20 illustrating that IDT was a good donor unit that can offer deep HOMO level and high V oc of the PSCs based on the target polymers can be anticipated.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| -5.5 eV |
| high V oc |

Explanation:

The paragraph mentions two properties:

1. A specific energy level of -5.5 eV.
2. A high Voc (Open-circuit voltage) of the PSCs (Polymer Solar Cells) based on the target polymers.

These two are the identified "Property Name" entities in the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| high V oc |

Explanation:

After reevaluating the paragraph, only one property is clearly identified as a material property:

1. High Voc (Open-circuit voltage) of the PSCs (Polymer Solar Cells) based on the target polymers.

The other entity, "-5.5 eV", is not a material property in this context, but rather a specific energy level value. Since the question asks for "Material property" entities, this value is not included in the final table.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: -5.5 eV , which were much lower than the reported benzodithiophene-NT ( PBDT - DTNT ) based poly- mers , 20 illustrating that IDT was a good donor unit that can offer deep HOMO level and high V oc of the PSCs based on the target polymers can be anticipated.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| -5.5 eV |
| high Voc |

Explanation:

The paragraph mentions two property values:

1. "-5.5 eV" - This is a specific value of energy, mentioned in the context of the HOMO level of IDT-based polymers.
2. "high Voc" - This is a property value mentioned in the context of the open-circuit voltage (Voc) of polymer solar cells (PSCs) based on the target polymers.

Note that I have assumed that "Voc" stands for "open-circuit voltage" as it is a commonly used term in the context of solar cells.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| -5.5 eV |

Explanation:

The paragraph mentions only one clear value of a material property:

1. "-5.5 eV" - This is a specific value of energy, mentioned in the context of the HOMO level of IDT-based polymers.

The other mention of a property value, "high Voc", is not precise enough to be considered a clear value of a material property. "High" is a relative term and does not specify an exact value. Therefore, I have not included it in the table.
